sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app-bar
        fixed
        dark
        dense
        color="black"
        shrink-on-scroll
        height="260px"
        src='https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/parallax/material.jpg'
        scroll-target="#scrolling-techniques-2"
        fade-img-on-scroll
        scroll-threshold="400"
        id="app-bar"
        @click="handleScroll"
    >
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
      <v-app-bar-title>
        Heavify
      </v-app-bar-title>
      <the-heading-navbar/>
    </v-app-bar>
</template>

<script>
import TheHeadingNavbar from "@/components/heading/TheHeadingNavbar.vue";
export default {
  components: {TheHeadingNavbar},
  data() {
    return {
      heightDecrease: 3
    }
  },
  methods: {
    handleScroll(event) {
      let elem = document.getElementById('app-bar');
      elem.style.height = "200px";
      console.log("llllllllll");
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
